inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
                          | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
                          | where ${item.AppServerQuery}
                          | where CounterName == @"% Processor Time"
                          | summarize avg(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
                          | render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf 
                          | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
                          | where ${item.AppServerQuery}
                          | where ObjectName == @"Memory"\nand CounterName == @"Available MBytes"
                          | summarize avg(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
                          | render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[format('Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where {0}
 and ObjectName == @"LogicalDisk"
and CounterName == @"Disk Writes/sec"
and InstanceName == @"_Total"
| summarize avg(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| render timechart', variables('ApplicationList')[copyIndex()].AppServerQuery)]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[format('Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where {0}
 and ObjectName == @"PhysicalDisk"
and CounterName == @"Avg. Disk Read Queue Length"
and InstanceName == @"_Total"
| summarize avg(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| render timechart', variables('ApplicationList')[copyIndex()].AppServerQuery)]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: [format('Perf| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)| where {0}| where ObjectName == "Network Adapter"  and CounterName == @"Bytes Total/sec" and CounterValue > 500000| summarize avg(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)| render timechart', variables('ApplicationList')[copyIndex()].AppServerQuery)]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: [format('Perf| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)| where {0}| where ObjectName == "Network Adapter"  and CounterName == @"Bytes Total/sec"  and  CounterValue > 200000| sort by CounterValue desc| summarizearg_max(CounterValue, *)byComputer| distinct  Computer, CounterValue| top 10 by CounterValue  desc nulls last| render barchart', variables('ApplicationList')[copyIndex()].AppServerQuery)]

    azure-vote-back:
      image: mcr.microsoft.com/oss/bitnami/redis:6.0.8
      container_name: azure-vote-back
      environment:
        ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD: "yes"
      ports:
          - "6379:6379"
  
    azure-vote-front:
      build: ./azure-vote
      image: {0}.azurecr.io/azure-vote-front:latest
      container_name: azure-vote-front
      environment:
        REDIS: azure-vote-back
      ports:
          - "8080:80"
